participant_1.background:
I am working on a building a robot to be my body double.
I am a famous twitch streamer.
I helped design the game starcraft.
I have an allergy to water.
I am a recluse.

participant_2.background:
I am retired and living the great life.
I have amazing children and grandchildren.
I had cancer but its gone now.
I can sew my own clothes.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking.
That's good to hear. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to sew my own clothes. I also enjoy spending time with my children and grandchildren.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have always wanted to learn how to sew.
It is a lot of fun, and it is very rewarding to be able to create something with your own hands.
I can imagine. What is your favorite thing to sew?
I love to sew dresses and skirts. I also love to make clothes for my children and grandchildren.
That sounds very creative. I am sure they love the clothes you make for them.
They do. They are always so excited to see what I have made for them.
That is great. I am glad you have such a creative outlet.
Thank you. I am very happy to have it.
I am sure your family is very happy to have you as well.
They are. I am very lucky to have them.
